verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> And the Philistines לָֽקְח֔וּ <WH3947> took אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיְבִאֻ֛הוּ <WH935> and brought מֵאֶ֥בֶן הָעֵ֖זֶר <WH72> it from Ebenezer אַשְׁדּֽוֹדָה׃ <WH795> unto Ashdod

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> took פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> When the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> they brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> it into the house דָּג֑וֹן <WH1712> of Dagon וַיַּצִּ֥יגוּ <WH3322> and set אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> it by דָּגֽוֹן׃ <WH1712> Dagon

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֤מוּ <WH7925> arose early אַשְׁדּוֹדִים֙ <WH796> And when they of Ashdod מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold דָג֗וֹן <WH1712> behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <WH5307> [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> to the earth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> דָּג֔וֹן <WH1712> Dagon וַיָּשִׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> again אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> him in his place

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <WH7925> And when they arose early בַבֹּקֶר֮ <WH1242> morning מִֽמָּחֳרָת֒ <WH4283> on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold דָג֗וֹן <WH1712> behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <WH5307> [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> to the ground לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> and the head דָּג֜וֹן <WH1712> of Dagon וּשְׁתֵּ֣י ׀ <WH8147> and both כַּפּ֣וֹת <WH3709> the palms יָדָ֗יו <WH3027> of his hands כְּרֻתוֹת֙ <WH3772> [were] cut off אֶל־ <WH413> on הַמִּפְתָּ֔ן <WH4670> upon the threshold רַ֥ק <WH7535> but דָּג֖וֹן <WH1712> only [the stump of] Dagon נִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> was left עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither יִדְרְכוּ֩ <WH1869> tread כֹהֲנֵ֨י <WH3548> Therefore neither the priests דָג֜וֹן <WH1712> of Dagon וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּאִ֧ים <WH935> nor any that come בֵּית־ <WH1004> house דָּג֛וֹן <WH1712> into Dagon's עַל־ <WH5921> on מִפְתַּ֥ן <WH4670> on the threshold דָּג֖וֹן <WH1712> of Dagon בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <WH795> in Ashdod עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this ס

וַתִּכְבַּ֧ד <WH3513> was heavy יַד־ <WH3027> But the hand יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> on הָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֖ים <WH796> upon them of Ashdod וַיְשִׁמֵּ֑ם <WH8074> and he destroyed וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> them and smote אֹתָם֙ <WH853> [בָּעֳפָלִים כ] (בַּטְּחֹרִ֔ים <WH6076> stronghold ק) אֶת־ <WH853> אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> [even] Ashdod וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1366> and the coasts

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <WH7200> saw אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH582> And when the men אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> of Ashdod כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it was כֵ֑ן <WH3651> so וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> that [it was] so they said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> must not יֵשֵׁ֞ב <WH3427> shall not abide אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> The ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָשְׁתָ֤ה <WH7185> is sore יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> with us for his hand עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> and וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> on דָּג֥וֹן <WH1712> upon us and upon Dagon אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our god

וַיִּשְׁלְח֡וּ <WH7971> They sent וַיַּאַסְפוּ֩ <WH622> therefore and gathered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all סַרְנֵ֨י <WH5633> all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> unto them and said מַֽה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> What shall we do לַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> with the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said גַּ֣ת <WH1661> unto Gath יִסֹּ֔ב <WH5437> be carried about אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> Let the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּסֵּ֕בּוּ <WH5437> about אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <WH310> And it was [so] that after הֵסַ֣בּוּ <WH5437> they had carried it about אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become יַד־ <WH3027> the hand יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּעִיר֙ <WH5892> was against the city מְהוּמָה֙ <WH4103> destruction גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> great מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> with a very וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> and he smote אֶת־ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city מִקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> both small וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> and great וַיִּשָּׂתְר֥וּ <WH8368> in their secret parts לָהֶ֖ם [עֳפָלִים כ] (טְחֹרִֽים׃ <WH6076> stronghold ק)

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֛וּ <WH7971> Therefore they sent אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God עֶקְר֑וֹן <WH6138> to Ekron וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּב֨וֹא <WH935> came אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> And it came to pass as the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God עֶקְר֔וֹן <WH6138> to Ekron וַיִּזְעֲק֨וּ <WH2199> cried out הָֽעֶקְרֹנִ֜ים <WH6139> that the Ekronites לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הֵסַ֤בּוּ <WH5437> They have brought about אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נִי <WH4191> to us to slay וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> us and our people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> So they sent וַיַּאַסְפ֜וּ <WH622> and gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said שַׁלְּח֞וּ <WH7971> Send away אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> and let it go again לִמְקֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> to his own place וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> so יָמִ֥ית <WH4191> that it slay אֹתִ֖י <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> us not and our people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become מְהֽוּמַת־ <WH4103> destruction מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> for there was a deadly בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> throughout all the city כָּבְדָ֥ה <WH3513> heavy מְאֹ֛ד <WH3966> was very יַ֥ד <WH3027> the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְהָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מֵ֔תוּ <WH4191> that died הֻכּ֖וּ <WH5221> not were smitten [בָּעֳפָלִים כ] (בַּטְּחֹרִ֑ים <WH6076> stronghold ק) וַתַּ֛עַל <WH5927> went up שַֽׁוְעַ֥ת <WH7775> and the cry הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> to heaven
